gainOrLossCalculation: Current portfolio value - value of wine purchased + sum of all wine sold
noAssets: You have no assets in your portfolio
noWines: You have no wines in your external portfolio

transfer.body: Are you sure you want to request to transfer this wine?
transfer.success: Your request to transfer the asset has been received.
transfer.failure: Your request to transfer failed. Please contact us on support@cultwines.com if you wish to discuss this

allocation-table.strategicAllocationInfo: Drawing on our macro views and fine wine market expertise, we use a top-down approach to define an optimal long-term allocation across regions and vintages
allocation-table.tacticalAllocationInfo: We employ a bottom-up analysis to identify individual wines and producers best placed to deliver superior returns based on the current market outlook

texts.portfolioValuation_tooltip: The total current market value of your portfolio(s) held with Cult Wine Investment. The total is the sum of the total market value of every line of stock in your portfolio(s).
texts.balancePending_tooltip: The total current pending balance of your account with Cult Wine Investment, including pending debits and credits. The total will include pending uncleared funds from the sale of stock, and pending invoices for stock and fees.
texts.totalRefunds_tooltip: Funds requested and sent to an external bank account gained from the proceeds from the sale of stock. The total funds transferred from your account with Cult Wine Investment to an external location.
texts.netContributions_tooltip: The total fresh capital transferred to your account with Cult Wine Investment for the purchase of stock, payment of invoices, fees and storage. This figure only includes funds directly relating to your investments and does not include charges for experiences or retail wine purchased for immediate delivery
texts.netPosition_tooltip: Your net position is your total profit or loss on your investment with Cult Wine Investment. This figure considers your current portfolio valuation, account balance, pending debits and credits, fresh capital entered, and total refunds transferred out of your account. This figure would be the difference between your net contributions minus any refunds and your current holdings value (the sum of your current Portfolio Valuation and your balance, including pending).
texts.availableBalance_tooltip: The total current available balance of your account with Cult Wine Investment. The total will include cleared funds on your account.
texts.currentHoldings_graph_tooltip: The total current market value of your portfolio(s) held with Cult Wine Investment plus the total current balance of your account, including pending debits and credits.
texts.netContributions_graph_tooltip: The total fresh capital transferred to your account with Cult Wine Investment for the purchase of stock minus the total funds transferred from your account to an external location gained from the proceeds from the sale of stock.

transferToExternalPortfolio.title: Add wine to external portfolio
transferToExternalPortfolio.success: Your asset has successfully been transferred to your external portfolio!
transferToExternalPortfolio.failure: Transfer of the asset has failed

failedToLoad: We were unable to retrieve your portfolio, please try again or contact us at support@cultwines.com
requestTransferWineToExternalLocation: Request transfer wine to external location
transferSuccessMessage: We have received your request to transfer your wine(s). A member of the operations team will be in touch within 24hrs

welcome_banner.title: Welcome
welcome_banner.subTitle: Your Cult Wine Investment portfolio value today is
welcome_banner.description: The historical performance chart is calculated in GBP, which is the base currency for the fine wine market. You can view your portfolio details and cash balance in the currency of your choice by updating the preferences in the account section under settings.
